name: Black Sherif
description:
'''Mohammed Ismail Sherif''' (born 9 January 2002), professionally known as '''Black Sherif''' and formerly '''Blacko''', is a [[Ghanaians|Ghanaian]] singer, rapper and fashion model. He initially gained popularity in 2021 with his song "First Sermon," which he released in May 2021. This was followed up with the "Second Sermon" in July 2021.

His breakthrough came in March 2022 with his [[Hit song|hit single]] "[[Kwaku the Traveller]]," which reached Number 1 on the Ghanaian and [[Nigerian]] [[Apple Music]] charts. (Its [[music video]] has been viewed 27 million times on youtube). He then released his debut album, ''[[The Villain I Never Was]]'', on 5 October 2022. His sophomore album, ''[[Iron Boy (album)|Iron Boy]]'', was released on 3 April 2025.

In May 2025, he was nominated in the [[BET Awards 2025|2025 BET Awards]].
